COPY_CONFIGURATION_DIALOG.HEADER_TEXT: Copy configuration and settings from the source site to the new site.
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.COPY_SUCCESS: All selected configurations were copied successfully.
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.DATAFLOWS_VA: All variables in dataflow {{dataflowId}} are mandatory
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.DUPLICATED_W: The Site you are adding is already in the Target Sites List!
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.ENTER_SOURCE: Enter source API Key or Site Domain
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.ENTER_TARGET: Enter target API Key or Site Domain
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.HEADER_TEXT: Copy configuration and settings from the current site to multiple target sites.
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.SOURCE_EQUAL: Target API key is the same of the Source!
COPY_CONFIGURATION_EXTENDED.TARGET_SITES: Recently created sites might take a while to be displayed in the list, however you can just copy and paste the API Key
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES: Copy all policies, or any of the following.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_ACCO: Default language, account harvesting prevention, login identifiers, and email verification settings.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_AUTH: Authentication methods enablement, password or push.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_EMAI: Account creation and deletion email templates.
Email templates and the redirect URL post verification.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_FEDE: Allow multiple identities for SAML / OIDC accounts.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_PASS: Email templates, security fields, and password reset token expiration settings.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_REGI: COPPA compliance, CAPTCHA, and login ID requirements.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_SECU: Password history restrictions and change interval.
CONFIGURATION_TREE.TOOLTIP_POLICIES_WEBS: Default screensets and session expiration configuration.
EMAILS_IMPORT_POPUP.SPECIFY_FILE: Please specify a zip file that contains the email templates to import:
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_COMPONENT.EXPORT_ERROR_H: Error - email templates were not exported
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_COMPONENT.IMPORT_ERROR_C: Error - {{notImportedEmailTemplatesCount}} of {{totalEmailTemplatesToImportCount}} email templates were not imported
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_COMPONENT.IMPORT_ERROR_G: Error - email templates were not imported
EMAIL_TEMPLATES_COMPONENT.TEMPLATES_IMPO: All {{importedEmailTemplatesCount}} email templates have been imported successfully.
GLOBAL.REPORT_USAGE: Please report the successful usage to help us track usages and being able to continue improving this tool.

MANUAL_REMOVAL_POPUP.CHECKBOX_TEXT: I understand that manual action is required to avoid data duplication.
MANUAL_REMOVAL_POPUP.TOAST_TEXT: Site list was copied to the clipboard

SITE_DEPLOYER_COMPONENT.SITES_CREATED_SU: All sites have been created successfully.
SITE_DEPLOYER_COMPONENT.SUCCESS_WITH_COP: All sites were created sucessfully, but there were some errors during the copy of the configuration.
